title: unable to play?
body:
is anyone else having trouble getting into games? i can get into a lobby but then it wont load the play button to start a search?
playing on oce

replies.body: Issues with that play button going gray can mostly be traced back to something blocking your network's connection to our servers. A quick checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should do the trick, but hit me back up if you're still not able to get back on the Rift!
